LanguageData.IgnoreSelfTitle: Ignore self in modlist matching check
LanguageData.KeepSelfLoaded: Keep self loaded after modlist change
LanguageData.MissingModsWarningText: Some mods used in this savegame are unavailable. Maybe you unsubscribed from them, authors are removed its creations, or mods was removed from local directory.
LanguageData.EditModListText: You can select mods you want to keep from savegame list and remove mods from currently loaded. Hold and drag to fast select/deselect.
LanguageData.ModDiffWillBeDisabledText: You removed ModDiff or it delendencies from list of active mods. It will disable this mod. Do you want to continue?
